page.title: 19Feed Merchants-Hade Edge
page.content: Most farmers buy their feeding supplies from feed merchants. These merchants can be found in any country area and sometimes in towns.Some of these merchants buy the{grain}from farmers and they mix several varieties together to make a complete food for farm animals.Vitamins are also added to make a better feed.Other merchants buy their supplies from large mills and deliver it to farms as the farmer requires.A firm like this can be found at{Hade Edge.}They buy wheat,barley, oats,etc.from suppliers in the North and East Ridings of Yorkshire.All these supplies are delivered by road transport to store at Hade Edge. Someone from the store goes around the local farms to take orders from the farmers and this is delivered by wagon to the farms when the farmer needs it.
